title: Magic DVD Ripper v7.1.0 + Patch.rar
description:
Includes the Magic DVD Ripper v7.1.0 installation package, a patch and a text file containing instructions.

Install as usual. After installation use the provided patch, then enter any name and serial combination to register the program. Done! Enjoy!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Magic DVD Ripper is a very easy and powerful DVD ripping software, which can convert DVD to VCD, SVCD, AVI(Xvid, DivX), WMV, MP3, MPEG2, MP4(for iPod, iPad, PSP, PS3 or smartphone etc mp4 player) formats or backup DVD to hard drive without any loss of quality. And you can enjoy them anytime without DVD discs or burn them to blank DVD or CD discs by using a burning software.

Key Features
* Convert DVD to AVI, WMV, MP4, MPEG2, MP3, VCD or SVCD
* Copy DVD movie to hard drive without any quality loss
* Remove all DVD restrictions (CSS, Region, RCE, Sony ARccOS, PuppetLock)
* Copy main movie or whole DVD
* Compress DVD-9 to DVD-5
* Split DVD-9 to two DVD-5 discs
* One-click backup
* High speed and high quality output

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHY UPGRADE?
